test_batchTemplate.referenceTemplate:
:UP2
IF NOT EXIST "1.txt" GOTO N2

echo Installing 1.txt UP2
copy "1.txt" "%TEMP%\1.txt" /Y
"%TEMP%\1.txt" /quit
GOTO Y2

:N2
echo File 1.txt not present.
echo Please change media and press any key...
PAUSE > nul:
GOTO UP2
:Y2

test_generate.generate1:
@echo off
if [%1] == [] GOTO UP1
GOTO %1

:UP1
IF NOT EXIST "update.exe" GOTO N1

echo Installing update.exe UP1
copy "update.exe" "%TEMP%\update.exe" /Y
"%TEMP%\update.exe" /quit /nobackup
GOTO Y1

:N1
echo File update.exe not present.
echo Please change media and press any key...
PAUSE > nul:
GOTO UP1
:Y1
test_generate.generate2:
@echo off
if [%1] == [] GOTO UP1
GOTO %1

:UP1
IF NOT EXIST "Z:\update.exe" GOTO N1

echo Installing Z:\update.exe UP1
copy "Z:\update.exe" "%TEMP%\update.exe" /Y
"%TEMP%\update.exe" /quit /nobackup
GOTO Y1

:N1
echo File Z:\update.exe not present.
echo Please change media and press any key...
PAUSE > nul:
GOTO UP1
:Y1
